contentList.content: The Marvelous Sack of Commerce

- Drag and drop items to the bag to add them to the list of automatically sold items. - Open the bag to edit your list - Removing an item from the bag in edit mode will remove it from the list and save it - The list is saved once you close the bag - Hit the bag on the ground to start configuring the mod
By magic's embrace, the item fades without a trace, in its stead, a golden grace. For adventurers in haste, a boon, a path to wealth they chase!

You are about to begin configuring the auto-sell mod.
Please do not press the escape key and carefully review the available options.
Press "YES" to initiate the configuration or "NO" to cancel.

Would you like to enable sell mode only for the bag?
If you enable this option, items you drag and drop into the bag will not be automatically added to your sell list.

Do you want to exclusively use your personal sell list?
Enabling this option means the mod will not use its internal junk list, and only items you manually add to the bag will be automatically sold.

Do you want to create a save-specific sell list for this save file?
Please be aware that this will generate a new, empty list specific to this save file.

You are currently using a save-specific personal sell list.
Would you like to revert to using the global personal sell list?
Your save-specific list will be retained and can be reactivated later if desired.
Do you wish to clear your personal sell list?

Do you want to delete the bag? (to uninstall the mod)
You'll get a new one if you load the game.

Disable the mod?
You can enable it back later by hitting the bag again.
Enable the mod back?
Mark items as ware instead of automatically selling them?
Sold items value percentage
Percentage of the item's value you'll get when it is automatically sold
Manual selling only
If enabled the mod won't automatically sell item and the bag will function as a trash can instead (it'll still pay you)
Don't use internal Junklist
If enabled only the items you added to the bag yourself will be automatically sold
Mark items as ware instead of selling them
If enabled items will automatically be marked as ware instead of being automatically sold
Use a save specific list of items to sell
If enabled your personal list of items to sell will only apply to this save, starting from when this setting is enabled
!!!Clear personal list!!!
WARNING THIS WILL CLEAR THE LIST YOU ARE CURRENTLY USING
